errors.error_description: Changed the order of peer setup steps, installing fhempy before setting up and activating the virtual environment
correction_candidates: Move pip3 install --upgrade fhempy after activating the virtual environment
Replace pip3 install --upgrade fhempy with python -m pip install --upgrade fhempy and move it after venv activation
Change the order to: create venv, activate venv, then install fhempy within the activated environment
Remove the pip3 install step entirely and let the systemd script handle the installation
errors.golden_answer: Change the order to: create venv, activate venv, then install fhempy within the activated environment
